HOOK: Work-life balance is destroying your real estate business. [ON-SCREEN: "Work-Life Balance Is A LIE"]

BRAND INTRO: "This is D.J. Paris with Keeping It Real Podcast, and this is your agent tip of the day."

SETUP: You promise your family you'll be home by six. You miss it again. Then the guilt hits. So you work distracted the next day, sneaking emails at dinner, half-present everywhere you go. [ON-SCREEN: "Sound Familiar?"] Sound familiar? Mindset coach Paul Salter says you're solving the wrong problem entirely.
[15-SEC RE-HOOK]: Here's what he told me that changed everything.

INSIGHT: "The goal is not to seek balance in entrepreneurship. That bullshit concept that doesn't exist. You need to seek alignment." [ON-SCREEN: "BALANCE vs ALIGNMENT"] Stop pretending you can build a seven-figure business on leftover hours. Real alignment looks like this: One top agent told his wife, "Tuesday and Thursday nights, I'm working until nine. Saturday mornings, I'm prospecting until noon. But Sunday? Phone's off. I'm completely yours." [ON-SCREEN: "+30% Production"] No fake promises. No sneaking work. His production jumped thirty percent, and his marriage got stronger.

REFRAME: When you stop pretending and start aligning, your family knows what to expect, your team knows what you need, and you stop carrying guilt into every conversation. Alignment isn't balanceâ€”it's honesty about the season you're in.

CTA: "Are you ready to have that alignment conversation with your family tonightâ€”yes or no?"

CLOSE: "See you next time."
